content:
2016 Waterpark Rates

Rates vary during season and for Hotel Guests, the General Public, and Timeshare Exchange Guests & Owners. Please check the correct chart below for the corresponding ticket rate. Groups of 25+ will receive the same rates as Timeshare Exchange Guests & Owners.

Ages 2 and under are free. Lockers are available for all-day rental at $6. Day passes may be limited when Split Rock Resort is at capacity. Rates are subject to change without notice.
